products.title: Brown hoodie
products.description: Embrace the Wildthoughts merch drop—crafted for free spirits. Each piece invites you to step boldly into your authentic self, celebrating individuality and fearless expression. Wear your thoughts, make a statement, and live unapologetically wild.

products.description: Happiness is like a butterfly, the more you chase it, the more it will evade you, but it you notice the other things around you, it will gently come and sit on your shoulder.
